Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class ProxyGameModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.ProxyGameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameModel, Subject
public class ProxyGameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameModel, Subject
This class is composed by all the GameModel and Subject methods
